text_block_list.text: ——the next day.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Hoi hoi! Ok, more balloons～! 
Let's flood it!

text_block_list.name: Committee Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Should we put a disco ball here? It'll totally change the 
atmosphere, I bet it'll be pretty wild…… that ok?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
All good! We're making this the best dance in history! 
Disco ball's are loud and flashy, that's dope～～!

text_block_list.name: Committee Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! Yeah it's hella flashy! And fresh…… 
I'm sure people'll be surprised, they're gonna love it!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
For real! ? Let's use even more lights! 
We need a plan that'll make everyone happy!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Maybe like, Karaoke dance time! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Play some live music～, just move forward ♪ Follow 
your heart ♪ and turn! Like that!

text_block_list.name: Committee Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Pair dancing with live music……! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yup! And soooomeday ♪ I'll surpass even myseeeelf ♪ 
Yo, Zephachi, join me～!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Twirl～♪ Hehe～ this is favorable.

text_block_list.name: Committee Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Ahaha～ awesome, that sounds fun!!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Helios is the type that expresses herself through songs! 
A mic performance somewhere in the middle could be nice!

text_block_list.name: Committee Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Alright then, let's expand the playlist! 
Not just waltzes, but some other hype stuff too!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Bet! Let's make this set pop! 
Wanna add more light colors? ?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Wouldn't you like to feel the breeze more? You can take 
the stage outside…… and feel freer, like a flower in the wind.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yo, yo, yo～～! ! Let's freakin do it! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yo Mira！ Anything you wanna add！？

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I……I think everyone's ideas are great. For now, I'll talk 
to the student council about moving the stage outside.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I owe youー! But don't forget to have some fun too Mira! 
Not just help! Something you wanna do!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Ah, like karaoke dance time, y'know! ? 
If you think of anything, go for it ☆

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. 
If I think of anything, I'll let you know.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
If y'all got requests send it～! 
We'll make a fire playlist!!

text_block_list.name: Committee Members
text_block_list.text: WEEEII～～! !

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, I'll go get some drinks. 
It's pretty hot today.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Wha! ? blessed ～ carbonated water please ♡

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Fufu. Helios really is amazing. Seems like she's always 
having fun, she's honest, and free——)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(———Having fun, huh. I'm happy if everyone else 
is happy, but…… I wonder if that's wrong……)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: (I…… we should have fun, together……?)
——A few days later.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: FINISHED! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Decorations good! Karaoke dance time playlist good! 
Sound and lighting good! Everything's perfect! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
So, we should rehearse…… but first, 
Helios, you should invite Ruby.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
So freakin true～～! ! I will～～! ! 
I'll call my lady! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: I'll wish you luck!!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(——It's not enough. 
Still…… a long way from mother's dancing.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(——Mother, in that video…… 
your performance was so brilliant, and captivating.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(To reach that peak…… something, is missing. 
If I don't find it, I…………)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: PRINCEEEEESS～～～～! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——Is there something you need?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: An invitation! ! Here! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
About the date, it's my big comeback! 
For real this time! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I'm serious, I thought about it a lot! 
How can I help you win best date? And I got it! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I want to show you something. 
I know you'll say yes!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……understood. I accept your invitation.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——！！ Oh my god, I can't wait！！
